p: A mixture of N-(3-{3-[2-(2,3-dihydro-benzo[1,4]dioxin-6-ylamino)-pyrimidin-4-yl]-pyrazolo[1,5-a]pyridin-2-yl}-phenyl)-benzamide (43 mg, 0.08 mmol) and and excess of Lawesson's Reagent in 1,4-dioxane (1 mL) was heated at 100 °C in a sealed tube. When LC/MS showed the starting material to be consumed, the mixture was cooled to ambient temperature and diluted with DCM. The organic phase was washed with water, dried over MgSO 4 and concentrated. The crude material was purified through silica gel to give the title compound as a yellow solid. 1H NMR (400 MHz, d 6-DMSO): δ 11.85 (s, 1 H), 9.34 (s, 1 H), 8.82 (d, J = 6.8 Hz, 1 H), 8.49 (d, J = 8.4 Hz, 1 H), 8.20 (d, J = 5.6 Hz, 1 H), 8.14 (s, 1 H), 7.97 (d, J = 8.0 Hz, 1 H), 7.80 (d, J = 7.2 Hz, 1 H), 7.57-7.42 (m, 6H), 7.35 (m, 1 H), 7.13-7.10 (m, 2H), 6.73 (d, J = 8.8 Hz, 1 H), 6.49 (d, J = 5.2 Hz, 1 H), 4.19 (m, 4H). MS (ESI) m/z = 557 [M+H] +.
